question: all the Hadith which imply that Muhammed (sallahu alaihay wassallam) is/was the reason for creation of this universe (Maqsood-e-Kainaat) are mawdo/dhaeed)
answer:
QUESTION
Imam Ibn Taimiyya(r.h) says that all the Hadith which imply that Muhammed (sallahu alaihay wassallam) is/was the reason for creation of this universe (Maqsood-e-Kainaat) are mawdo/dhaeed) and he says the purpose of creation was this verse (only) " 51: 56. And I have not created the jinn and the men but that they may worship ME" but i have heard in the biyaans of many deoband ulama "Muhammed (s.a.s) was the purpose of creation (of this universe)"? b) why do Ulama discourage 'Shirt Collars' even in Shalwar Kameez?
ANSWER


Share:
1. There is no reason for claiming the fabrication of such Ahaadith. In%0D%0Afact, there is no contradiction whatsoever between this verse of the holy%0D%0AQur'aan and those Ahaadith. Because, although the world was created for the%0D%0Apurpose of worship, it was Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) who was%0D%0Athe best and most exalted worshipper of Allah and this Aayat implies that if%0D%0Ait were not for those who worshipped Allah, He would have not created man%0D%0Aand Jinn.%0D%0AMoreover, this Aayat only discusses the purpose and not the reason for the%0D%0Acreation of man and Jinn only, whereas those Ahaadith discuss the reason and%0D%0Anot the purpose for which the entire universe (and not only man and Jinn)%0D%0Awas created. Allah Ta'ala says in the holy Qur'aan, 'And we have not sent%0D%0Ayou except as a mercy for the worlds'. It is accepted by one and all that if%0D%0Athis was not for the mercy of Allah, the universe would not remain intact%0D%0Aeven for a single moment. And in this case, Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi%0D%0AWasallam) was chosen as the form of that mercy. So, it would be safe to say,%0D%0A'If it were not for Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam), the world%0D%0Awould have not been in existence.'%0D%0A2. We do not see any reason for the discouraging of the collar.%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0AMufti Ebrahim Desai
